The  PEFF  reframes  scientific  concepts  by  recognizing  that  every  entity,  system,  or  interaction  
can

nested
 
offspring
 
of
 
these
 
archetypes.

physics,

of

text:
Linear  Layer  Energy  Vector  Node  
Governs  energy  propagation  along  linear  dimensions.  
Found  in  photons  traveling  through  electromagnetic  waves.  
 Stabilizing  Mass  Node  
Anchors  mass  and  balances  systems  within  linear  frameworks.  
Found  in  electrons  orbiting  atomic  nuclei.  
 Linear  Dimensional  Bridge  Node  (Light)  
Bridges  energy  and  mass  through  the  speed  of  light  cc.  
Inherent  in  all  electromagnetic  interactions.  
Standard  Linear  Model  
Higgs  Boson  Energy  Node  
Generates  mass  for  fundamental  particles.  
Found  in  high-energy  collisions  (e.g.,  CERN).  
 Higgs  Field  Stabilizer  Node  
Stabilizes  mass  via  the  Higgs  mechanism.  
Pervasive  across  quantum  fields.  
 Light  Squared  Node  (c²)  
Connects  energy  and  mass  as  described  by  Einstein's  equation.  
Present  in  relativistic  systems.
